summary: VK, short for VKontakte, is a popular Russian social media platform. It allows users to message, create groups, share media, and play games. With over 500 million accounts, it is mainly used by Russian speakers. As of 2024, it's the 30th most visited website globally. VK was once popular in Ukraine but was banned in 2017. In Russia, it remains one of the top websites, ranking sixth in popularity as of 2022.
title: VK (service)
